title: Alex Staples
subtitle: Software Developer
summary: Front-end software engineer driven by the crafting of seamless user interfaces and fostering the creation of frictionless development environments.

wasabi.longform: Senior engineer for the applications team at a cloud storage startup. Created React-powered web tools for internal use by the operations teams, designing core architectural components in company codebases. Key contributor to the development of the customer-facing Wasabi Console application. Supervised the daily creation and deployment of service images for testing, working closely with the infrastructure team.
bullets: Senior front end engineer for the applications team at a rapidly-growing cloud storage company
Designed and developed core UI architecture and features for tools that are used internally by the operations and support teams
Planned and delivered new features for the customer-facing Wasabi Console application
Supervised the daily creation and deployment of service artifacts for QA, serving as a liaison with the infrastructure team
Provided mentorship to junior engineers and guided them through learning development processes
Interviewed candidates for newly-opened front end engineering roles

motifSoftware.longform: Front-end focused developer and consultant for a variety of contract clients in the greater Boston area. Worked primarily within the React web ecosystem and interacted with RESTful services which were created using the .NET platform.
bullets: Front end developer as a contractor working with Motif Software
Developed major features for React applications for a variety of clients
Interacted with .NET framework for backend, EpiServer, and AI chatbots
Wrote extensive technical documentation for digital cytology software

genpact.longform: Front end developer for a digital user experience consulting firm, doing work primarily within the React ecosystem. Projects were mainly focused on eCommerce and had a special emphasis on semantic HTML structure as well as accessibility. Participated in extensive internal research on best practices for web development as well as emerging technologies.
bullets: Front end engineer for digital customer experience consulting firm
Worked with clients based in Boston and Chicago on web development for their eCommerce platforms
Projects centered on the React ecosystem and required special emphasis on internationalization and accessibility
Conducted internal research pertaining to vector graphics and the Elm language

ca.longform: Supporting role for development of CA Performance Management - a network infrastructure analysis and management product. Focused on the construction of internal tooling, including a visual API query builder, as well as a vendor certification search tool. Also wrote a suite of network metrics calculation tests, and began the conversion of existing tools to React and Electron. Assisted the sustaining team with resolving issues reported by customers.
bullets: Developer for CA Performance Management - a network infrastructure analysis and management product
Constructed internal tooling, including a visual API query builder, and a vendor certification search tool
Wrote extensive test suite for verifying network metrics calculations
Assisted the sustaining team with resolving issues reported by customers

kemmcare.longform: Developed a new website for KEMM Care Medical Staffing using a full stack of web technologies, including HTML, CSS, JQuery, and Node.js. Alongside an illustrator, helped to design a modern layout using a single-page app approach to display information about the company and allow prospective employees to search and apply for positions. I also set up the company's server infrastructure and internal communications, and procured and set up company hardware.
bullets: Full stack contractor for a medical staffing firm, in a lead role of revamping and managing their main website and IT infrastructure
Developed a JQuery based web front end that interacted with a Node.js web server and a MySQL database, along with creating a basic custom ORM
Managed a subcontract with a designer to help create new company branding and an entirely new single page app concept
Procured and managed company hardware and software, including employee laptops, web domains, software licenses, virtual infrastructure and Google Workspace
